(OOC:)

*Shrugs* Well then transformers are semi organic. To what degree ho=
wever could still be questioned but probably something better reserved for =
the site message board rather than cluttering up the mailing list eh?

I da=
re say the others must be getting tired of reading the debate back and fort=
h on how transformers could or could not be organic in some nature...

:)

=
Jon

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: David Torrey 
  To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 7:48 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Bea=
st Wars


  TM2 Dinobot, there's proof. Megatron used schematics and DNA fr=
om the original Dinobot to build a new one, therefor making the original ve=
rsion of the Beast Wars semi-orgainc.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
 From: Jon Hogan 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, October 0=
5, 2000 8:20 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    (OOC:)

    True they=
 may have lungs....but does that mean they're organic? 
    Consider medica=
l technology. When our lungs fail can we not get 
    artifical lungs built=
 or be put on a machine that mimics the effect 
    of "breathing". So yes =
maybe they need to breathe but still there's 
    no proof either for or ag=
ainst, to be honest, that the beast forms 
    use organic bits.

    Anywa=
ys in the long run I don't think it really matters eh? :)
